data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick in a good position for Hellas Verona!
In the minute 3, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Inter.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 9, Inter's Ashley Young misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter.
In the minute 11, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Inter's half?
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Inter's area.
Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 12, Hellas Verona push forward at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi and Pawel Dawidowicz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Inter defence.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Inter.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
In the minute 19, Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Piero Giacomelli awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Federico Dimarco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hellas Verona.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
Free kick Inter.
In the minute 29, Pawel Dawidowicz (Hellas Verona) has received a yellow card from Piero Giacomelli.
Attention is being given to Hellas Veronaâ€™s Pawel Dawidowicz and play has been suspended briefly.
Pawel Dawidowicz is back on his feet again.
In the minute 31, Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Verona.
In the minute 31, Piero Giacomelli awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
The match at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pawel Dawidowicz, who is down injured.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a first change, with Matteo Lovato replacing the possibly injured Pawel Dawidowicz.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 34, In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
Inter needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 36, Inter's Lautaro Martinez gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Inter's Stefan De Vrij gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Inter.
Alessandro Bastoni (Inter) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Inter in the half of Hellas Verona.
Piero Giacomelli waits before resuming play because Federico Ceccherini for Hellas Verona is still down.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 40, Federico Ceccherini for Hellas Verona is back on the field again.
Free kick Inter.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Eddie Salcedo for Hellas Verona who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 43, Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Ashley Young fires in a strike for Inter.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eddie Salcedo returns to the field for Hellas Verona after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 45, Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Inter's area.
Piero Giacomelli awards Inter a goal kick.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Inter's Nicolo Barella looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Verona.
Marcelo Brozovic is booked for the away team.
In the minute 45, Mattia Zaccagni (Hellas Verona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Verona to check on Nicolo Barella, who is grimacing with pain.
The second half has started at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 46, Inter have a goal kick.
Hellas Verona make their second substitution with Ivan Ilic replacing Eddie Salcedo.
Inter are coming forward and Nicolo Barella gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 48, Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Verona.
Goal! Lautaro Martinez gives Inter a 0-1 lead.
Achraf Hakimi instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 53, The home team replace Ebrima Colley with Kevin Ruegg.
Darko Lazovic is replacing Mattia Zaccagni for the home team.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Inter to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 56, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Ivan Ilic of Hellas Verona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Inter at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Verona to check on Matteo Lovato, who is grimacing with pain.
The home team has substituted Matteo Lovato with Koray Gunter. Ivan Juric is thus making his fifth change.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Lautaro Martinez for Inter drives towards goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Ivan Ilic gets an equalizer for Hellas Verona. The score is now 1-1.
Inter are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 64, Federico Dimarco (Hellas Verona) gets a yellow card.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Inter.
Inter's Milan Skriniar scores with his head to give his side a 1-2 lead.
Great play from Marcelo Brozovic to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Inter.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Arturo Vidal is on a sub for Ivan Perisic for Inter.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Inter.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 74, In Verona, Lautaro Martinez of Inter is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Arturo Vidal's header is off-target for Inter.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Inter pushes forward through Achraf Hakimi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 77, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Inter to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
In the minute 79, Free kick Inter.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Inter.
Giangiacomo Magnani (Hellas Verona) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 82, In Verona, Romelu Lukaku of Inter is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Alessandro Bastoni has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Hellas Verona just outside Inter's area.
In the minute 86, In Verona Hellas Verona attack through Federico Dimarco. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Inter at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
In the minute 87, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roberto Gagliardini is replacing Lautaro Martinez for Inter at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Inter's Romelu Lukaku breaks free at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Inter's Romelu Lukaku gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Piero Giacomelli awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
